divs: Sighting Detailsplease help. i was comeing home from the mall with my mom and we seen a pyramid shaped object in the sky at first we thought it was atop a cell phone tower but as we moved in the car we could see it wasn't. the shape was luminescent, it had a red light at the top and blue-ish light at the base. it appeared to have a gray looking Ora around it and it stayed in (silent) place for a few minutes then it shot so fast we couldn't see it to move to a higher spot in the sky then a few seconds later it did the same thing but was gone. PLEASE HELP my mom refuses to call 911 and i'm scared shitless.....what if they comeback!!
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
